text: Na'ankure Nagra tamantahina ke'na hu'noankita, nagrama fri'nugeta keontahi tamavutamava nehuta, nagrama avaririho hu'nama huramantoa kana atreta haviga avariri'nageno'a, havizamo tamagritera egahie. Na'ankure Ra Anumzamofo avufina havi avu'ava nehuta, havizama tro'ma hanaza zamo'a Ra Anumzamofona azeri arimpa ahegahie.
